indiyawe aaradhanayen palamuwa panduwata paharadun afganisthana inima sunuwisunu kala jadeja kadulu 4k dawalu athara rawichandran ashwin kadulu 3k binda damuweya.inima aarambhaye sitama aarakshakari pithiharambaayaka nitharawu afganisthana pithikaruwan siya palamu oowara 10 thula ras kale kadullak dawi lakunu 48k pamani.palamu kadulla lesa nawros mangal lakunu 5k laba sitiyadi mohomad shamige panduwak kelinma kadulle wadimen dawi giyeya.afganisthana inime wadima lakunu sankhyawa wartha wuye samiyulla shenwarige piththeni.
